briefTitle: Quality of Life and Sexuality of Patients Over 65 Years Undergoing Adjuvant Treatment for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Evaluation of the Quality of Life and Sexuality of Patients Over 65 Years of Age Undergoing Adjuvant Treatment for Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women over 65 years of age
* treatment by adjuvant therapy for breast cancer
* pTxNxM0
* sexually active at least three months before inclusion
* in couple or not

Exclusion Criteria:

* Inflammatory breast cancer
* Not sexually active before breast cancer diagnosis
* Opposition to fill sel questionnaire and collection of the data
